entities.description: Perceived effect of the same amount of methamphetamine compared to previous use.
Efforts made by an individual to reduce or stop methamphetamine use in the past 12 months.
Inability of an individual to cut down or stop methamphetamine use more than once in the past 12 months despite attempts.
Desire to reduce or stop methamphetamine use in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent's perception of how the same amount of methamphetamine affects them now compared to previous use.
Denotes whether the respondent has tried to reduce or stop using methamphetamine in the past 12 months.
Indicates the respondent was unable to reduce or stop methamphetamine use despite attempts in the past 12 months.
Reflects the respondent's wish to cut down or stop methamphetamine use in the past 12 months.
